meanings.definition: To hit another player's ball in croquet
meanings.sent1: During the game, I tried to roquet my friend's ball to gain an advantage.
meanings.sent2: Players often roquet each other's balls strategically to improve their position.
meanings.sent3: In a friendly match, I accidentally roqueted my opponent's ball into a difficult spot.
meanings.sent4: Her skillful roquet maneuver completely changed the course of the game.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the mallet as it roqueted the ball echoed through the garden.

meanings.definition: A shot in croquet where a player hits another player's ball
meanings.sent1: His precise roquet knocked my ball out of play.
meanings.sent2: The player's successful roquet allowed them to continue their turn.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected roquet caused a stir among the spectators.
meanings.sent4: The roquet was so powerful that it sent the ball flying across the field.
meanings.sent5: With a swift roquet, she secured her victory in the match.

meanings.definition: A collision between two balls in croquet
meanings.sent1: The loud roquet between the balls startled the players nearby.
meanings.sent2: After the roquet, both balls changed direction on the field.
meanings.sent3: The roquet resulted in a funny bounce that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The roquet created a chaotic moment in the otherwise calm game.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected roquet added an element of surprise to the match.
